TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IComparable

summary.span: 定义由值类型或类实现的特定于类型的通用比较方法，旨在对其实例进行排序。

span.span: Defines a generalized type-specific comparison method that a value type or class implements to order or sort its instances.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此接口由其值可以排序或排序的类型实现。This interface is implemented by types whose values can be ordered or sorted. 它要求实现类型定义单个方法（），该方法指示当前实例在排序顺序中的位置是在同一类型的第二个对象之前、之后还是与其相同。It requires that implementing types define a single method, , that indicates whether the position of the current instance in the sort order is before, after, or the same as a second object of the same type. 实例的 实现由 和 等方法自动调用。The instance's implementation is called automatically by methods such as and . 方法的实现必须返回具有以下三个值之一的 ，如下表所示。The implementation of the method must return an that has one of three values, as shown in the following table. |“值”Value|含义Meaning| |-----------|-------------| |小于零Less than zero|当前实例在排序顺序中位于 方法指定的对象之前。The current instance precedes the object specified by the method in the sort order.| |零Zero|此当前实例与 方法指定的对象在排序顺序中的位置相同。This current instance occurs in the same position in the sort order as the object specified by the method.| |大于零Greater than zero|此当前实例遵循 方法在排序顺序中指定的对象。This current instance follows the object specified by the method in the sort order.| 所有数值类型（例如 和 ）都实现 ，如 、和 。All numeric types (such as and ) implement , as do , , and . 自定义类型还应提供自己的 实现，以便对对象实例进行排序或排序。Custom types should also provide their own implementation of to enable object instances to be ordered or sorted. ## Examples 下面的示例说明 的实现和必要的 方法。The following example illustrates the implementation of and the requisite method. [!code-cpp[IComparable Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IComparable Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IComparable Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IComparable Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IComparable Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/IComparable Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 CompareTo(object obj) cil managed
Public Function CompareTo (obj As Object) As Integer

param.name: obj
param.span: 与此实例进行比较的对象。

span.span: An object to compare with this instance.

summary.span: 将当前实例与同一类型的另一个对象进行比较，并返回一个整数，该整数指示当前实例在排序顺序中的位置是位于另一个对象之前、之后还是与其位置相同。

span.span: Compares the current instance with another object of the same type and returns an integer that indicates whether the current instance precedes, follows, or occurs in the same position in the sort order as the other object.

returns.span: 一个值，指示要比较的对象的相对顺序。

span.span: A value that indicates the relative order of the objects being compared.
The return value has these meanings:
Value
Meaning
Less than zero

description.span: 此实例在排序顺序中位于 之前。

span.span: This instance precedes in the sort order.
Zero

description.span: 此实例在排序顺序中的位置与 相同。

span.span: This instance occurs in the same position in the sort order as .
Greater than zero

description.span: 此实例在排序顺序中位于 之后。

span.span: This instance follows in the sort order.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法由可对其值进行排序或排序的类型实现。The method is implemented by types whose values can be ordered or sorted. 它由非泛型集合对象的方法（如 ）自动调用，以对数组的每个成员进行排序。It is called automatically by methods of non-generic collection objects, such as , to order each member of the array. 如果自定义类或结构未实现 ，则无法对其成员进行排序，并且排序操作可以引发 。If a custom class or structure does not implement , its members cannot be ordered and the sort operation can throw an . 此方法只是定义，必须由特定的类或值类型实现才能使其生效。This method is only a definition and must be implemented by a specific class or value type to have effect. 返回值部分（"前面"、"与" 和 "后跟"）中指定的比较的含义取决于特定实现。The meaning of the comparisons specified in the Return Value section ("precedes", "occurs in the same position as", and "follows") depends on the particular implementation. 按照定义，任何对象比较大于（或跟随） `null`，而两个 null 引用的比较结果相等。By definition, any object compares greater than (or follows) `null`, and two null references compare equal to each other. 参数 `obj`必须与实现此接口的类或值类型的类型相同;否则，会引发 。The parameter, `obj`, must be the same type as the class or value type that implements this interface; otherwise, an is thrown. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 将实现 的 `Temperature` 对象与另一个对象进行比较。The following example illustrates the use of to compare a `Temperature` object implementing with another object. `Temperature` 对象只需包装对 方法的调用即可实现 。The `Temperature` object implements by simply wrapping a call to the method. [!code-cpp[IComparable Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IComparable Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IComparable Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IComparable Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IComparable Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/IComparable Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

exception.span: 不具有与此实例相同的类型。

span.span: is not the same type as this instance.

para.span: 对于对象 A、B 和 C，必须满足以下条件：

span.span: For objects A, B and C, the following must be true:
A.CompareTo(A) must return zero.

para.span: 如果CompareTo （B）返回零，则CompareTo （A）必须返回零。

span.span: If A.CompareTo(B) returns zero, then B.CompareTo(A) must return zero.

para.span: 如果CompareTo （B）返回零， CompareTo （c）返回零，则CompareTo （c）必须返回零。

span.span: If A.CompareTo(B) returns zero and B.CompareTo(C) returns zero, then A.CompareTo(C) must return zero.

para.span: 如果CompareTo （B）返回的值不是零，则CompareTo （A）必须返回相反的符号值。

span.span: If A.CompareTo(B) returns a value other than zero, then B.CompareTo(A) must return a value of the opposite sign.

para.span: 如果CompareTo （B）返回一个 不等于零的值，而CompareTo （c）返回与 相同的值 ，则CompareTo （c）必须返回与 和 相同的符号值。

span.span: If A.CompareTo(B) returns a value not equal to zero, and B.CompareTo(C) returns a value of the same sign as , then A.CompareTo(C) must return a value of the same sign as and .

para.span: 使用 方法来确定类的实例的排序。

span.span: Use the method to determine the ordering of instances of a class.
